151.content:
The decorations were set, snacks placed on the table, and the children were ready to throw confetti. Today was Grandma Jade’s retirement party and the people that loved her were ready and waiting for her... At least that was the case ten minutes ago.

Several of Jade’s co-workers had found themselves submerged among the dips and chips they had just set on the table, their struggles went unheard as they swam through the thick chilli fluid.

Many family members had also found themselves scattered on Jade’s hardwood flooring, they would appear only as specks to the average person. They scrambled to each other, hoping to regroup to figure out their predicament.

Yet, the ones that were the most afraid was Jade’s daughter, Angela and her granddaughters, Amelia and Rose. Having been sat on Jade’s leather sofa they had been shrunk on there, giving themselves a vantage point over the others on the floor and the door that had just opened...

Jade came home tired with aching feet. Deciding to skip off her flip flops her bare feet felt relief agains her cool hardwood floors. After taking a breath, she was surprised to see her home had been redecorated. Banners hung proudly along with Balloons celebrating her retirement. She huffed, feeling embarrassed that she’d arrived to her own party early, stomping ahead to take down the decorations, not feeling the popping of tiny bodies on the soles of her feet. Their forms splattered red over the hardwood and were crushed between her toes as the unaware giantess stood on her tiptoes.

Angela wailed and sobbed into the arms of her daughters. It was truly harrowing for her mother to unwittingly flattenen her friends and family. Her tears were only more strained as she approached the snack table...

Jade wandered to the small table of snacks. The woman smirked as at least there was something nice about this party. Her hands hovered over the delicious bowls of chilli and potato chips. Deciding the seize a chip, Jade delighted in sticking it into the still chilli dip. Unknowingly scooping and sloshing her much-loved coworkers as they gripped and struggled against the chip as it dragged across their sticky prison. Almost automatically, Jade shoved the chip into her maw, chomping and crushing the chip between her crooked teeth. Pulverising her old friends into sloshy chunks of meat amongst the dry remains of potato chips. The giantess continued to snack until the bowl was nearly empty, deciding to slowly saunter towards her leather sofa...

Having seen the end of most of their family and friends, the three woman struggled to move as the titanic woman strolled towards them, her footsteps pounded the floor, shaking them to the core... Jade wasted no time seating herself as her massive ass loomed above them. It descended with incredible speed, planting itself like a fallen meteor against the surface of the sofa.

Thankfully, the trio had moved enough to avoid the immediate impact of Jade. But the aftershocks had knocked them down... They were at the mercy of a giantess that would only see them as a speck of dirt...
